messages.en: level 33(post)
How could it……
(Shush!)
(Umm——)
(Are they still there?)
(Still there……!)
(They seem to be looking for something——)

messages.zh: （——有一个看向这边了！撤回掩体！）
messages.en: (——One of them is looking this way! Get back under cover!)
Is it my imagination.
(Can you snipe them?)

messages.zh: （我们与敌人相隔至少六百米。）
messages.en: (We’re at least 600 meters from the enemies.)

messages.zh: （自从他们出现以后，爆炸声就停止了......）
messages.en: (Since their appearance, the explosions have stopped……)

messages.zh: （他们的站位很分散，我不可能一次性消灭全部三个。）
messages.en: (They’re standing very far apart, I can’t take out all three at once.)

messages.zh: （而且那些整合运动的动作，和普通的暴徒有明显的区别。）
messages.en: (And those Reunion Movement’s actions, are very different from ordinary mobsters.)

messages.zh: （其他整合运动，似乎没有那么厚重的装扮。）
messages.en: (The other Reunion Movement, don’t seem to have such heavy gears.)

messages.zh: （没错。可见，一旦轻举妄动，只要有一个活下来、引来更多的暴徒，我们就危险了。）
messages.en: (That’s right. Apparently, if we act rashly, even if only one of them survives and summons more of them, we’d be in great trouble.)

messages.zh: （所以结论是不能。明明是三对三，却像是被包围了呢。）
messages.en: (So the conclusion is we can’t. Three on three, but it feels as if we’re surrounded.)

messages.zh: （有点不妙。我很讨厌这种感觉。）
messages.en: (This isn’t good. I hate this feeling.)

messages.zh: （猎人被更庞大的野兽逼入绝路，不得不藏起来的感觉。）
messages.en: (The feeling of a hunter forced into dead end by larger beasts and having to hide.)
(Wait, they seem to be communicating with someone——)

messages.zh: （在这里是听不到内容的。让我去。）
messages.en: (We can’t hear them at this distance. Let me go.)
(No, it’s too dangerous to move now.)

messages.zh: （太安静了。我们不知道敌人是什么样的感染者......如果有听力强化的那种，可就要遭殃了。）
messages.en: (It’s too quiet. We don’t know what kind of Infected the enemies are……if there are the hearing-enhanced types, we’d be doomed.
(——What are they waiting for?)
(I feel——very weird.)
(Is it——)
(Jessica, did you……)
(Me……me too……)
(The temperature’s dropped again……)
(I’m……cold……)
(Could it be them……)
(——! Jessica, why are you biting your fingers——)

messages.zh: （她在防止牙齿因为打颤相碰而出声。）
messages.en: (She’s preventing her teeth from chattering.)
(What an impressive child.)
(In my eyes, you are a child too.)

messages.zh: （......回温了。那三个整合运动也离开了。）
messages.en: (It’s warming back up. Those three Reunion Movement’s left as well.)

messages.zh: 是在测试什么东西的功能吗——
messages.en: Are they testing something——

messages.zh: ——带着冰寒一声不响而来，带着温度默默离开，只留下受害者在暗处瑟瑟发抖。
messages.en: ——Arriving silently with the chills, and departing silently with the warmth, leaving only the victims shuddering the dark.

messages.zh: 可恶，这些家伙，就像传说中的雪怪一样。
messages.en: Damn it, those people, are like the yetis in the legends.
Perhaps you’re right.
They could well be the yetis.
……Found it.

messages.zh: 还是冰冻的墙体。但是，你们看——
messages.en: Still frozen walls. But, look here——

messages.zh: 底下掩埋着黑色的源石？
messages.en: There is black originium buried beneath?

messages.zh: 果然。寒潮是从这个地点向外释放的。
messages.en: Just as I thought. This is the source of the cold waves.

messages.zh: 墙体上能看到鲜明的纹路。
messages.en: You can see clear patterns on the wall.

messages.zh: 这块源石就是区域降温的中心。
messages.en: This chunk of originium is the center of the regional temperature drop.

messages.zh: ——我在做佣兵的时候，营房里流传过一阵这样一个传说。
messages.en: ——When I was still a mercenary, there was once a legend in the camps.

messages.zh: 乌萨斯西北域有一支感染者游击队一直在与乌萨斯为敌。
messages.en: In the northwest of Ursus, there is a guerilla troop of Infected fighting against Ursus.

messages.zh: 他们中，有一个铁塔般的怪物——据说，没有任何东西能阻止它前进。
messages.en: Among them, there is a towering monster——they said, nothing can stop that thing’s advance.

messages.zh: 而在那支游击队里，又有这样一支小队——
messages.en: And within that guerilla troop, there is a squad like this——

messages.zh: 他们像是寒冬。他们走过的地方全数冰结。
messages.en: They’re like winter. Wherever they go freezes up.

messages.zh: 建筑轰然倒下，化作粉末，四散弥漫在空旷的战场。
messages.en: Buildings crumble, turn into dust, dispersed across the empty battlefield.

messages.zh: 而战壕中，躺满了被冻成冰块的乌萨斯士兵。
messages.en: And the trenches, are filled with Ursus soldiers frozen into chunks of ice.
Do you think……

messages.zh: 是的。我觉得他们就是那个传说。
messages.en: Yes. I think they are that legend.
——“Yeti Squad”.

messages.zh: 前进吧。我想我们快要找到整合运动的据点了。
messages.en: Let’s move. I think we’re getting close to Reunion Movement’s hideout.
Eww……
What is it?
Did you smell……
The odor of something scorched?
